creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
\"Nigenaki mono onna no uchiyori te yorokobe ru engi\"
An becoming thing: women gathering to delight in an omen.
(quoted from the Ploow Book of Sei Sho_nagon)
\"Fuji no kata
Tsukuba no kata mo
Hikikakeru
Kasumi no kinu wa
Waga nenu de yoshi\"
It is fortunate I need not sleep in the robe of mist cloaks Mt. Fuji and Mt. Tsukuba.
by Ittei Hajime
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: Clothes Rack, Robe and Smoking Chest
